Beautiful looking chains - nice quality, beautiful flat box links, sturdy, and look like more expensive pieces of jewelry. (I got these in the stainless steel, silver, 14"/6mm and 18"/4mm sizes.) The only issue was this, they are super shiny which, unfortunately, was the reason I needed to return them. I needed the chains to match (or better coordinate) with a sentimental vintage charm. My vintage charm and the super shiny chains didn't look good together. Obviously this is not a fault of the vendor or a problem with the chains I received.

Overall this is a great, sturdy, well made necklace. The only thing I can find to ensure a fair review is to point out the very small gap in the clasp. I don't have a worry about it, but figured I should mention it. This review mirrors that of the same necklace of another size. So I think this is just how it is made.
